title: Factors in declining European birth rate

content.prompt: Which of the following contributed the most to the overall birth rate trend after 1965 shown in the graph?

choices.label: The shift from an industrial economy to a service-based economy
The immigration of large numbers of people from former colonies to Western Europe
Population control efforts by the European Union
Medical advances and expanded educational and economic opportunities for women

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
